wikipedia_page.main: Richard Edwards (born 25 August 1956 in Llanelli) is a former Welsh Labour politician who was a Member of the National Assembly for Wales for Preseli Pembrokeshire from 1999 to 2003.  Before politics he worked in local government and was a political researcher.

response: * Richard Edwards (musician), freelance trombone player and composer

* Richard Edwards (educator) (1822–1908), Welsh American superintendent and college president
* Richard Edwards (Welsh politician) (born 1956), former Welsh Labour politician
* Richard Edwards (fashion company), a New York fashion design company
